Class Circle

java.lang.Object
Circle
public abstract class Circle extends Object
This abstract class provides a the base template and movement for any circle

  • Constructor Details

    • Circle

      public Circle(SolarSystem solar, double circleDistance, double circleDiameter, double circleAngle, double circleCentreAngle, double circleCentreRotation, String circleColor)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      solar - instance of the solar system
      circleDistance - distance of the circle from the object revolved/moved around
      circleDiameter - the diameter of the circle
      circleAngle - the angle of the circle in respect to the object revolved/moved around
      circleCentreAngle - the centre angle for the the circle
      circleCentreRotation - the centre point of rotation for the circle
      circleColor - the color of the circle

  • Method Details

    • drawCircle

      public void drawCircle()
      drawCircle method implements the "drawSolarObjectAbout" using the solar instance form the solar system class

    • moveCircle1

      public void moveCircle1(double circleMoveSpeed)
      moveCircle1 method
      Parameters:
      circleMoveSpeed - allows to change the speed of the circle movement Changes the circle angle by incrementing it this allows for revolving around a primary object
